Address.label: Address
Address.value: 942 SOUTH SHADY GROVE ROAD, MEMPHIS, Tennessee, 38120, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: FedEx pioneered overnight delivery in 1973 and remains the world's largest express package provider. In its fiscal 2020 (ended May 2020), FedEx derived 51% of revenue from its express division, 33% from ground, and 10% from freight, its asset-based less-than-truckload shipping segment. The remainder comes from other services, including FedEx Office, which provides document production/shipping, and FedEx Logistics, which provides global forwarding. FedEx acquired Dutch parcel delivery firm TNT Express in 2016. TNT was previously the fourth- largest global parcel delivery provider.
